scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach -A -p -v  --exclude fern -p run clean
scripts.compile: yarn workspaces foreach -A -p -v --exclude fern -p run compile
scripts.test:ete: yarn workspace @fern-api/cli dist:cli:dev && yarn workspace @fern-api/seed-cli dist:cli && yarn workspace @fern-api/ete-tests test
pnpm --filter @fern-api/cli dist:cli:dev && pnpm --filter @fern-api/seed-cli dist:cli && pnpm --filter @fern-api/ete-tests test
scripts.depcheck: yarn workspaces foreach -A -p -v --exclude fern --exclude @fern-api/template-codegen  run depcheck
scripts.fern:local: yarn workspace @fern-api/cli dist:cli:prod && FERN_NO_VERSION_REDIRECTION=true node $(yarn workspace @fern-api/cli bin fern:prod)
scripts.fern-dev:local: yarn workspace @fern-api/cli dist:cli:dev && FERN_NO_VERSION_REDIRECTION=true node $(yarn workspace @fern-api/cli bin fern:dev)
scripts.fern:build: POSTHOG_API_KEY="" yarn workspace @fern-api/cli dist:cli:prod && echo $(yarn workspace @fern-api/cli bin fern:prod)
scripts.fern-dev:build: yarn workspace @fern-api/cli dist:cli:dev && echo $(yarn workspace @fern-api/cli bin fern:dev)
scripts.fern-local:build: yarn workspace @fern-api/cli dist:cli:local && echo $(yarn workspace @fern-api/cli bin fern:local)
scripts.seed:build: yarn workspace @fern-api/seed-cli dist:cli && echo $(yarn workspace @fern-api/seed-cli bin seed)
scripts.publish: yarn workspaces foreach -A --exclude fern --no-private -p --verbose npm publish --access public
scripts.fern-script: yarn workspace @fern-api/scripts dist:cli && node $(yarn workspace @fern-api/scripts bin fern-scripts)
scripts.demo-setup: yarn workspace @fern-api/demo-setup dist:cli && node $(yarn workspace @fern-api/demo-setup bin demo-setup)
scripts.seed:local: yarn workspace @fern-api/seed-cli dist:cli && node $(yarn workspace @fern-api/seed-cli bin seed)
scripts.fern:local: pnpm workspace @fern-api/cli dist:cli:prod && FERN_NO_VERSION_REDIRECTION=true node $(pnpm workspace @fern-api/cli bin fern:prod)
scripts.fern-dev:local: pnpm workspace @fern-api/cli dist:cli:dev && FERN_NO_VERSION_REDIRECTION=true node $(pnpm workspace @fern-api/cli bin fern:dev)
scripts.fern:build: POSTHOG_API_KEY="" pnpm workspace @fern-api/cli dist:cli:prod && echo $(pnpm workspace @fern-api/cli bin fern:prod)
scripts.fern-dev:build: pnpm workspace @fern-api/cli dist:cli:dev && echo $(pnpm workspace @fern-api/cli bin fern:dev)
scripts.fern-local:build: pnpm workspace @fern-api/cli dist:cli:local && echo $(pnpm workspace @fern-api/cli bin fern:local)
scripts.seed:build: pnpm workspace @fern-api/seed-cli dist:cli && echo $(pnpm workspace @fern-api/seed-cli bin seed)
scripts.publish: pnpm workspaces foreach --no-private --parallel --verbose npm publish --access public
scripts.fern-script: pnpm workspace @fern-api/scripts dist:cli && node $(pnpm workspace @fern-api/scripts bin fern-scripts)
scripts.demo-setup: pnpm workspace @fern-api/demo-setup dist:cli && node $(pnpm workspace @fern-api/demo-setup bin demo-setup)
scripts.seed:local: pnpm workspace @fern-api/seed-cli dist:cli && node $(pnpm workspace @fern-api/seed-cli bin seed)
